00001 // Class to represent a shape within the STAR geometry
00002 // Ben Norman, Kent State
00003 // 25 July 01
00004 
00005 #ifndef STI_SHAPE_H
00006 #define STI_SHAPE_H
00007 
00008 // allowed values for shapeCode
00009 enum StiShapeCode {kPlanar = 1, kCylindrical, kConical}; 
00010 
00011 class StiShape{
00012 public:
00013 
00014     // constructor (for subclass use)
00015     StiShape(): halfDepth(0.), thickness(0.){}
00016     StiShape(float halfDepth_, float thickness_);
00017 
00018     // accessors
00019     float getHalfDepth() const { return halfDepth; }
00020     float getThickness() const { return thickness; }
00021     virtual StiShapeCode getShapeCode() const = 0;
00022     
00023     // mutators
00024     void setHalfDepth(float val);
00025     void setThickness(float val);
00026 
00027 protected:
00028     
00029     float halfDepth;  // 1/2 extent in z, always >= 0
00030     float thickness;  // radial thickness, always >= 0
00031     
00032 };
